data.title: main title design for "The Magnificent Seven"
data.meta_description: Many thanks to Antoine Fuqua, Gary Barber, Roger Birnbaum, Todd Black, and everyone at MGM and Sony for giving Shine the opportunity to design and animate the main and main-on-end sequences for this amazing new film.
